DOC.brief_summary: Starting Jan 2012 interval 4 month minimum number 1200 egyptian woman ask complete questionairre evaluate knowledge different contraceptive method
DOC.brief_title: Egyptian Women Knowledge Use Different Contraceptive Methods
DOC.detailed_description: PATIENTS AND METHODS Sample size , Time study : Starting Jan 2012 interval 4 month minimum number 1200women . Type study : Analytical crossectional study Place study : Ain Shams University Hospital , Gynecological outpatient clinic Amireya primary care medical center ( family plan clinic ) . Statistical methodology : SPSS program use data analysis . Appropriate significance test use accord type data . After oral consent take , Women ask complete short write questionnaire include social data , reproductive information , question common contraceptive method . Testing readability comprehension questionnaire do first collect 50 questionnaire analyze data . AIM OF THE WORK The aim study evaluate knowledge use different available contraceptive method among woman attend Ain Shams University maternity hospital gynecological outpatient clinic Amireya primary care medical center ( family plan clinic ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age : 18 51 year old 2 . Using contraceptive method least 6 month continuously . 1 . Infertile 2 . Vaginal bleed unknown etiology . 3 . Current pregnancy 4 . Menopausal
